channel.title: Face Creation - Potential like GTA/ESO/FO3/ME1
channel.description: So the fabled - or should I say parabled? - Black Mesa Face Creation System. Could this potentially be modified for use for custom player character creation, like that seen in GTA5, the Bethesda Fallout and Elder Scrolls games, or the Mass Effect series?

item.title: Face Creation - Potential like GTA/ESO/FO3/ME1
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Your friend’s not the first, there is none, Source is not the engine for that sort of game so the question’s sort of moot anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Face Creation - Potential like GTA/ESO/FO3/ME1
item.dc:creator: WhenWorldsCollide2
item.description:
I just ask because a friend of mine had this idea for a Half-Life MMORPG, similar to ESO or STO, and I thought there was some real potential there.

Read full topic

item.title: Face Creation - Potential like GTA/ESO/FO3/ME1
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Yeah, Multiplayer has it.
It doesn’t have, like, 12 noses and 8 hairstyles or anything, but it has everything the FCS for NPCs does, minus a few glasses submodels.

Read full topic

item.title: Face Creation - Potential like GTA/ESO/FO3/ME1
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Isn’t there already a mild system like that in place? It’s probably not gonna get on a much higher level, especially not as detailed as those titles, but it’s something.

Read full topic
